constraints.name: sub_area_size
constraints.description: 子区域的宽度和高度至少为2

constraints.name: corner_heights
constraints.description: 子区域的四个角的高度必须高于该子区域内的其他所有单元格的高度
constraints.formal: for all (i, j) in sub-area, if (i, j) is not a corner, then height[i][j] < min(height[corners]) where corners are the four corners of the sub-area

constraints.name: distinct_heights
constraints.description: 每个单元格的高度是唯一的
